head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FERRETTI, ANDREW N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FERRETTI, ANDREW N.

block.p: FERRETTI-Andrew N. Of Nutley, NJ, on May 7, 2000, husband of Anne (nee Fiorito), father of Andrea Khoobiar and William J., grandfather of William B. and Emily E. Ferretti, Sargis A. and Anne R. Khoobiar. Funeral from S. W. Brown & Son Funeral Home, 267 Centre St., Nutley, NJ, on Wednesday, 9 AM. Mass St. Clare Church, Clifton, NJ, 10 AM. Interment Immaculate Conception Cemetery, Montclair. Visiting 2-4 and 7-9 PM, Tuesday. Memorial contributions to Atlantic Hospice at Mountainside Hospital, Bay Ave, Montclair, NJ 07042, in memory of Mr. Ferretti would be appreciated.

FERRETTI-Andrew N. Of Nutley, NJ, on May 7, 2000, husband of Anne (nee Fiorito), father of Andrea Khoobiar and William J., grandfather of William B. and Emily E. Ferretti, Sargis A. and Anne R. Khoobiar. Funeral from S. W. Brown & Son Funeral Home, 267 Centre St., Nutley, NJ, on Wednesday, 9 AM. Mass St. Clare Church, Clifton, NJ, 10 AM. Interment Immaculate Conception Cemetery, Montclair. Visiting 2-4 and 7-9 PM, Tuesday. Memorial contributions to Atlantic Hospice at Mountainside Hospital, Bay Ave, Montclair, NJ 07042, in memory of Mr. Ferretti would be appreciated.
